source_info.purpose: for the preservation of cultural heritage of the area and also to preserve the old tradition and art .

During the financial year 2013-14, no grant has been sanctioned from the Ministry, however the society has taken up the following works out of its own income.
The society has constructed a Mani Tungchur at Lungbu for the benefit of the devotees.
 The society has organized seminars and dramas for eradication of social evils prevailing amongst the people of the area. 
The society has been organizing and sponsoring all the all the important traditional festivals of the village in its original form.
